game.name: ALARIC
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: May your wrath conquer the cursed beings and save the land. Fight like hell and avenge your father. Explore a giant castle filled with monsters and get stronger to withstand the forces of hell in this boomershooter, metroidvania adventure.
